thread.title: BRIEF-Art's Way Manufacturing Says Amber Murra To Resign As CFO

title: BRIEF-Art's Way Manufacturing Says Amber Murra To Resign As CFO

organizations.name: reuters) - art’s way manufacturing co inc

text: March 20, 2018 / 9:50 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Art's Way Manufacturing Says Amber Murra To Resign As CFO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Art’s Way Manufacturing Co Inc : * ART’S WAY MANUFACTURING CO INC - ‍ON MARCH 15, 2018, AMBER MURRA NOTIFIED CO OF HER RESIGNATION AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER - SEC FILING​ * ART’S WAY MANUFACTURING CO INC - ‍AMBER MURRA’S RESIGNATION IS EXPECTED TO BE EFFECTIVE AS OF JUNE 1, 2018 * ART'S WAY MANUFACTURING CO INC - EXPECTS MURRA S DUTIES WILL BE ASSUMED ON INTERIM BASIS BY CARRIE GUNNERSON, COMPANY S CURRENT PRESIDENT, CEO Source text: ( bit.ly/2uaqNSq ) Further company coverage:
